sections.title: Installation
sections.content: First, install the package via PyPI: pip install mkdocs-gitbook Then include the theme in your mkdocs.yml file: theme: name: gitbook

sections.title: Motivation
sections.content: Gitbook was a static-site generator written in JavaScript. Mkdocs is a static-site generator written in Python. Gitbook is no longer a static-site generator, nor does it use git, nor is it free or open source!
